additionalInformation: When randoming a hero, the hero starts with a free, unsellable Faerie Fire, except in Turbo Mode.
The attack damage from multiple instances fully stacks.
Couriers are able to use Faerie Fire.
name: Faerie Fire
description: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
tips: For the mid-laner, Faerie Fire can create an advantage over the enemy, as well as save them from a gank.
When diving past a Tier 1 Tower in the laning phase, a Faerie Fire can restore enough health to withstand one more tower hit, which can help you get the kill or retreat if need be.
